title: Chevron Ships Unload Venezuelan Oil in US Ports Amid Blockade
description: At least two vessels chartered by Chevron Corp. that picked up oil from Venezuela since the Trump administration launched a partial maritime blockade have successfully unloaded cargoes at US ports, according to data reviewed by Bloomberg.
content: At least two vessels chartered by Chevron Corp. that picked up oil from Venezuela since the Trump administration launched a partial maritime blockade have successfully unloaded cargoes at US ports, according to data reviewed by Bloomberg.
